findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality indefinitely may limit future business opportunities and complicate the ability to use similar information elsewhere.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The provision for unlimited indemnification could expose a party to significant financial risk without clear boundaries on liability.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The absence of a limitation on liability can lead to substantial financial exposure in case of breaches or disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of all rights to Company A may restrict the other party's ability to use their own contributions in future projects.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The provision for recovering attorneys' fees may deter parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to potential high costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
